::DrillBit::

Blender was fast, DrillBit was barly able to dodge the blade. He was
able to staep to the side, switch his right hand with his drill, and
attempted to stick it in Blender. He saw KitKat.
"Welcome to the party, my lady." He said, in a sarcastic voice.
